**Edited <time datetime="2016-08-17T14:58:42Z" title="08/17/2016 02:58  PM" data-short="7 yr">August 17, 2016</time> by AlmostNASA**

REAL <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center"><abbr title="Kerbal Space Center"><abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr></abbr></abbr> IN KSP Stock Release is now up on [Spacedock!](http://spacedock.info/mod/901/Real%20KSC%20in%20KSP%20STOCK), For now, the user has to place the statics using the CTRL+K Menu, but soon i will included Placed statics

This is my first experience with this mod so I'm still learning it. I can't seem to figure out how to spawn at the launch pads. When I hit make launch site option when editing the pads I don't end up spawning there.

>

> 
> 
> This is my first experience with this mod so I'm still learning it. I can't seem to figure out how to spawn at the launch pads. When I hit make launch site option when editing the pads I don't end up spawning there.

in the <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr>, if you hit the Kerbal Konstructs icon, it will bring up a list of pads you have made, select your pad you want to launch from and boom,.

It might just be the size of the area where the engines of the Atlas V are or the position of the launch clamps. If you have Blender you could try resizing it.
Remember that the Stock version is still VERY VERY experimental
